strapiJob.title: Roastery Production Tech
strapiJob.description:
The production tech role at Airship ensures that all production systems are operating efficiently and that all production procedures are being executed in a way that maintains quality products and creates the most customer value.  

The Production Tech is responsible for the following work areas:

  • Inventory stocking/restocking
  • Packaging coffee
  • Fulfilling orders
  • Facility and equipment maintenance
  • Food safety
  • Shipping/receiving

Specific responsibilities and expectations include:

  • Maintain facilities, cupping-lab and production space cleaning, upkeep and organization
  • Record and analyze production data related to order management, packaging preparation, and fulfillment to drive efficiency into production processes
  • Perform routine equipment cleaning and maintenance
  • Efficiently coordinate outgoing shipments to customers to ensure a quality experience 
  • Maintain food safety records in accordance with food safety policy and procedures.
